original_text: These are the rules for the special days of the Lord. You must tell people that they must bring offerings to the Lord on these days. They will bring gifts for burnt offerings each day. They must bring offerings of grain, animals and wine.
korean_text: 이것들은 여호와의 절기라 너희는 공포하여 성회를 열고 여호와께 화제를 드릴지니 번제와 소제와 희생제물과 전제를 각각 그 날에 드릴지니

sentences.original_text: for the special days of the Lord
that they must bring offerings to the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 주님께 제물을 가져와야 한다는 것을

sentences.original_text: They will bring gifts for burnt offerings
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 번제물을 위한 선물을 가져올 것입니다
